about_the_game:
"DISGUSTINGLY GORGEOUS...!!"
Uniting the best of simulation, RPG, and arcade Zombie titles, Dead Fury quickly surprises the player with its indie-like charm, and its fluid AAA-like look and feel.



Welcome to "Dead Fury," a fast-paced, zombie shooter set amidst the breathtaking landscape of New Zealand's South Island. But don't be fooled by the beautiful scenery — a deadly zombie virus has emerged from the permafrost, threatening to eradicate humanity and turn the world into a desolate wasteland.



PLAY IN FIRST OR THIRD-PERSON PERSPECTIVES!
Decimate hordes of freaks from either first or third-person perspectives. Your game, your choice.

Hair Of The Zom...
In "Dead Fury," you'll play as Jaxon, Armed with an array of weapons and backed by the military, your mission is to collect plasma from defeated zombies — a crucial component for the temporary antidote known as the "hair of the zom". Your survival, and the survival of your family, hinges on your ability to take down the infected and find a cure.





Not just "another generic zombie shooter" DEAD FURY Introduces a brand new game mode: "HORDE ROYALE" which brings the battle ring from Battle Royale titles like Fortnite, turns it into a raging forest fire that surrounds the player, and intensifies the action as it compresses the game space over time.



Action Action Action!
DEAD FURY also stands on its own with its great balance of straight-to-the-point action and a refined to critical learning curve - allowing players of all capabilities to take on huge hordes of relentless and varying locomotion enemies.
Join us on this journey through a world on the brink of annihilation, and let's discover if you have what it takes to survive the fury of the dead



"Dead Fury, unlike its competitors, is EASY TO PICK UP AND HARD TO PUT DOWN.
Dead Fury thrusts players into the thick of battle without the need for hours of grinding - Players will be treated to a challenge that is both dynamic and satisfying, the ever-increasing and relentless zombie horde will ensure that.

REASONS TO PLAY
Get involved with a fast-paced and quickly developing game that listens to the community, appreciates the support, and will endeavor to add your recommendations to the game!
MAKE SURE YOU FOLLOW THE GAME ON THIS SITE, ON OUR WEBSITE OR YOUTUBE CHANNEL!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Recommend using SSD Storage for best performance
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7 Or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Recommend using SSD Storage for best performance
